name: Grape Software
tag_list: custom-software-development, adobe-flex-development, java-development, offshore-software-development, web-applications, outsource-software-development
overview:
Grape Software is a Software House company which provide Software Development and Consulting Services concerning Adobe Flex/AIR and Java/J2EE technology.

Grape Software specializes mostly in rich UI applications development with the extensive use of Adobe Flex/AIR technology, where Company focus on User Experience and Usability aspects as core values of the quality software.

Company offers services with regards to the three main areas: I. Software Development II. Adobe Flex/AIR technology trainings III. IT Consulting services

…where software development services consist of:

  1. Enterprise class systems (Java/J2EE)
  2. Web Applications (Adobe Flex, Java/J2EE, JSP, JSF, Struts etc.)
  3. Desktop Applications (Adobe AIR, Java Swing)

Company has a well defined software development process with the use of Agile methodologies and quality procedures..
